snippet: Channel 4 in Britain is celebrating the opening of the Winter Olympics with a change in its corporate logo to rainbow colors, and a promotional advertisement to applaud the gay and straight athletes who are taking part.
abstract: Channel 4 in Britain is celebrating the opening of the Winter Olympics with a change in its corporate logo to rainbow colors, and a promotional advertisement to applaud the gay and straight athletes who are taking part.

headline.main: Broadcaster Releases ‘Gay Mountain’ Video for Olympics in Sochi
